remark.en: Student need to get the Advisor‘s approval  to take this course.(Please contact Advisor for exact class time and location.)
remark.ch: 限博士生。須指導老師同意，正確上課時間、地點請洽各指導老師

content.en: Each Advisor instructs PhD students doing topical research according to their thesis content.
content.ch: 指導博士班研究生進行論文研究

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Products/Creative Performance

en.competency: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield
